snippet: American advertisers are jumping on the World Cup bandwagon, attracted both by changing demographics and by the nature of event programming, where viewers are less likely to skip commercials.
abstract: Advertising column examines reasons why advertiser participation is much more robust for the 2014 World Cup than it was for the event in 2010; notes so many blue-chip marketers are on board for the 2014 World Cup that the list resembles roster for premier marketing opportunity like the Olympics or the Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: American advertisers are jumping on the World Cup bandwagon, attracted both by changing demographics and by the nature of event programming, where viewers are less likely to skip commercials.

headline.main: With 2014 World Cup, Soccer Ascends to Role as Premier Ad Platform
headline.print_headline: With 2014 World Cup, Soccer Ascends to Role as Premier Ad Platform
